question: is this too skinny?
question_content: I'm 5'4 1/2, 100 lbs, curvy i don't look too skinny im thin enough to be a model ive been  told lots of times that i should do  modeling

answers.answer_content:
Forget modeling.  You are too short.

You need to be concerned about your height.  You should weigh 125-130 lbs.  So, yes......you are WAY TOO THIN.
And if you really don't know this, then you are just another eating disorder----a walking disaster just waiting to happen.

http://www.healthchecksystems.com/heightweightchart.htm

From your description, it's hard to judge. A photo would really help make a recommendation. However, you sound somewhat underweight to be strong and healthy. Regardless of many of the other answers, there are lots of models that aren't taller than you. Many of the women featured in Playboy have been shorter than you and looked gorgeous. If you wish, send a digital photo and I'll give an honest opinion. Send it to eschertzer@sbcglobal.net. I promise to be honest.

I have to say no. I am the same size as you.. in my 40's and according to all my doctors I am not too skinny.  And I also do not have an eating disorder, I love my food too much!!! But sorry dear, as I.. you are too short to be a model.
You're underweight but models have to be tall. For example the minimum height for America's Next Top Model is 5'7".
Well, You could be a model, but the thing is, they'd think you're pettite and wont be able to look for many jobs, cause many like tall models. But yÃ³u're weight is pretty accurate for a model.
How do you feel about your body? Are you happy with how you look? To me 100 seems thin but it depends... Another 10 pounds in the right places would be good if you feel OK about it.

i think it more depends on how you feel now how much you weigh, if you weigh 100 pounds and feel healthy then you are fine, but if you weigh 100 pounds nad feel lethargic or sick or something then proabably not, im 5 6 and i weigh 100 lbs and thats what my doctor said, as long as you are eating and have lots of energy and feel fine then you are.
